description: Aspect model for an exchange of comment belonging to a entity.

UuidV4Trait.description: The provided regular expression ensures that the UUID is composed of five groups of characters separated by hyphens, in the form 8-4-4-4-12 for a total of 36 characters (32 hexadecimal characters and 4 hyphens), optionally prefixed by "urn:uuid:" to make it an IRI.

AuthorCharacteristic.description: Characteristic for an E-Mail or a BPNL

CommentTrait.description: The provided regular expression ensures that the text of a comment is limited to the maximum length of 5.000 characters.

ObjectTypeCharacteristic.description: Defining a string value for the objectType.

BpnlTrait.description: The provided regular expression ensures that the BPNL is composed of prefix 'BPNL', 10 digits and two alphanumeric letters.

commentId.description: The Comment ID uniquely identifies the entity within the business relationship between a customer and its supplier.

objectId.description: The ID of the object to which the comment belongs.

author.description: The E-Mail address of the creator who wrote the comment. In case comment creator wants to stay anonymous, show BPNL in app which is sent the comment along.

postedAt.description: Point in time when the comment was created.

changedAt.description: Point in time when the comment was last changed.

commentText.description: Text up to 5.000 characters in format "UTF-8" will be shared.

commentType.description: Type of a comment to indicate a priority.

requestDelete.description: Indicates that the deletion of the comment is requested by sender incl. all of it's history.

listOfReferenceDates.description: Point in time the comment belongs to.

objectType.description: Aspect Model which the comment refers to. The value MUST consist of the Catena-X aspect model unique identifier of the referenced data model without a version.

simulationId.description: The simulation ID uniquely identifies a simulation scenario. All aspects that belong to the same simulation scenario share a simulation ID

customer.description: The Business Partner Number Legal Entity (BPNL) of the party requesting materials from a supplier.

supplier.description: The Business Partner Number Legal Entity (BPNL) of the party providing materials to a customer.
